title: 3D fonts-Fonts made from Objects
content: Hello amazing people of Typophile. I am looking for actual 3D fonts. I just need to get some type of idea for a client. By 3D I mean actual letters made from objects. Any advice is greatly appreciated.
author: Checko Salgado

comments.content:
Don't know about "objects", but the work of Takenobu Igarashi is It.

hhp
